ygData.subject: Re: Weightless Containers
ygData.msgSnippet: How s it going everyone? A totally weightless container would weight nothing and be 100% weight reduction. I think that the only bags that qualify are
ygData.messageBody:
How's it going everyone?<br><br>A totally
weightless container would weight nothing and be 100% weight
reduction. I think that the only bags that qualify are the
summoned bags that a Mage or a Shamen can make. Not sure
about the Shammy bag, but the Mage one is 100% weight
reduction, 0 weight, 4 slot and can fit HUGE things in it--
but, it is no rent and disappears (along with anything
inside it) within 30 mins after you log off.<br><br>Xela
Orcbane<br>Druid of the 38th Season<br>DOMH -
Xev<br><br>Gracknor<br>Troll Beastlord of 12 warders<br>Xev<br><br>Rumble
Grifthander<br>Ravashing Rogue of the 23rd rank<br>FV
